metadata.title: CVE-2018-13797 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The macaddress module before 0.2.9 for Node.js is prone to an arbitrarycommand injection flaw, due to allowing unsanitized input to an exec(rather than execFile) call.

criterions.comment: node-macaddress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
